lead_paragraph: The four-time winner Ghana moved near the quarterfinals at the African Cup of Nations on Thursday, beating Namibia by 1-0 on a goal by Junior Agogo. Ghana, which last won the title in 1982, leads Group A with 6 points and needs only a tie in its final game to ensure a place in the final eight. Guinea and Morocco have 3 points each, after Guinea beat Morocco, 3-2. Namibia has none.
